text: Catherine Mary Inglese (December 16, 1958 â€“ July 24, 2019) was an American college basketball coach. She was the head coach for women's basketball programs for a total of 27 years, at the University of Vermont, Boston College, and the University of Rhode Island from 1980 to 2007. Inglese was born in Wallingford, Connecticut. Inglese had a traumatic brain injury after falling in a stairwell on July 17, 2019. She had surgery at North Shore University Hospital in Manhasset, New York. Inglese died from her injuries on July 24, 2019, aged 60. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Sportspeople from Connecticut
title: Cathy Inglese
